mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FBOARDS(title, content, userId) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select @rownum :=@rownum +1 as row, A.* from (select * from fboards order by listnum DESC)A, (select @rownum :=0)B)C where C.row between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select listNum, title, userId, writeDate, viewCount, likeCount, CAST((CONTENT) AS CHAR(10000) CHARACTER SET UTF8) AS CONTENT FROM FBOARDS where listNum=#{listNum}
